description: This Grafana dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of the state and performance of Kubernetes resources within your cluster, with a focus on resource counts, utilization, and availability. It covers key metrics across nodes, namespaces, pods, and containers, making it easier to monitor and troubleshoot your cluster effectively.

targets.expr: sum( irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", image!~"^k8s.gcr.io/pause:.*$"}[5m]) / ignoring(cpu, endpoint, id, image, instance, job, node_name, metrics_path, name, resource, service, unit) kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"} ) by (namespace, pod, container)

sum( irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", image!~"^k8s.gcr.io/pause:.*$"}[5m]) / ignoring(cpu, endpoint, id, image, instance, job, node_name, metrics_path, name, resource, service, unit) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu"} ) by (namespace, pod, container)

title: Kube State Metrics
